channel.title: Comments on: Cowrywise Referral – How To Signup and make 5k Daily

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/cowrywise/#comment-1186">ABDULHAKEEM ABDULRAZAK</a>.
Contact the customer care on their apk to stop the automation
item.content:encoded:
In reply to ABDULHAKEEM ABDULRAZAK.

Contact the customer care on their apk to stop the automation

item.title: By: ABDULHAKEEM ABDULRAZAK
item.dc:creator: ABDULHAKEEM ABDULRAZAK
item.description: Hey. Have wanted to complain before now, I mistakenly automate my payment method and ever since then my cowrywise savings have been toping by it self I hope there's an option to stop it. I search and search I couldn't see any please if you could help I would really appreciate thanks you.
item.content:encoded:
Hey. Have wanted to complain before now, I mistakenly automate my payment method and ever since then my cowrywise savings have been toping by it self I hope there’s an option to stop it.
I search and search I couldn’t see any please if you could help I would really appreciate thanks you.
